messages.content: A Stronger Voice for Calder Valley

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Push for investment in flood defences
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We should have an MP who will fight for better defences, not vote against them as Whittaker did in 2016.
Halifax and Huddersfield A&E are under threat of closure. Labour pledges that no NHS hospital will close.
I have worked with local businesses and know they are vital to our economy. We need stronger support for our high streets.
We need teachers and proper resources for our children to get the education they deserve.
The valley is blighted by air pollution, and I will hold the government to account for avoiding the issue.

issues.education: Protect our school budgets: We need teachers and proper resources for our children to get the education they deserve.
issues.environment: Campaign for clean air: The valley is blighted by air pollution, and I will hold the government to account for avoiding the issue.
issues.health: Fight for our hospitals: Halifax and Huddersfield A&E are under threat of closure. Labour pledges that no NHS hospital will close.
issues.socialWelfare: Restoring proper care funding for our elderly: Craig Whittaker MP voted FOR the current Tory Government's £4bn cuts to care budgets. Labour will reinvest in social care for our older community. We should be helping our parents and grandparents when they need it most.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm Josh and I was born and raised in Calder Valley. I think it's high time that we had an MP who cares about this valley. As a local councillor, I've witnessed the damage that £100m of Tory cuts has done to our valley. But they have gone unopposed by our Tory MP Craig Whittaker, who instead voted for those cuts in Parliament. I've worked with local businesses and know that they are vital to our economy. We need stronger support for our high streets. We should have an MP who will fight for better defences, not vote against them like Whittaker did.

endorsements.endorsement: We've seen how effective and dedicated Josh is as a councillor, and we know that as our MP, he will always put the concerns of our communities first. We couldn't have a better candidate for the valley.

examples: I've worked with local businesses and know that they are vital to our economy. We need stronger support for our high streets.
I'm proud, however, of the difference that the Calderdale administration, which I was part of, has made in recent years. We secured £2.5bn in flood defence funds.
Craig Whittaker MP voted against investing in better flood defences.
He voted for devasting social care cuts.
He pledged money to rebuild local schools and has barely mentioned it in Parliament. We deserve better.
